CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Account_CSM_Health_Rating_Previous__c="Black", OR( ISPICKVAL(CSM_Health_Rating__c, "Red"), ISPICKVAL(CSM_Health_Rating__c, "Amber"), ISPICKVAL(CSM_Health_Rating__c, "Green") ) ), "Improved", IF( AND( Account_CSM_Health_Rating_Previous__c="Red", OR( ISPICKVAL(CSM_Health_Rating__c, "Amber"), ISPICKVAL(CSM_Health_Rating__c, "Green") ) ), "Improved", IF( AND( Account_CSM_Health_Rating_Previous__c="Amber", ISPICKVAL(CSM_Health_Rating__c, "Green") ), "Improved", IF( Account_CSM_Health_Rating_Previous__c=TEXT(CSM_Health_Rating__c), "Other", "Regressed" ))))
CustomField.label: Account CSM Health Change
